# HUD::SET_MP_GAMER_TAGS_SHOULD_USE_POINTS_HEALTH

## Summary
If true the gamer tags will use settable points instead of ped or vehcile health

## Parameters
* **INT** playerNum
* **BOOL** usePointsHealth
